machine_start_gcode.default_value:
;Start Gcode
G90 ;absolute positioning
M118 X25.00 Y25.00 Z20.00 T0
M140 S{material_bed_temperature_layer_0} T0 ;Heat bed up to first layer temperature
M104 S{material_print_temperature_layer_0} T0 ;Set nozzle temperature to first layer temperature
M107 ;start with the fan off
G90
G28
M132 X Y Z A B
G1 Z50.000 F420
G161 X Y F3300
M7 T0
M6 T0
M651
M907 X100 Y100 Z40 A100 B20 ;Digital potentiometer value
M108 T0
;Purge line
G1 X-110.00 Y-60.00 F4800
G1 Z{layer_height_0} F420
G1 X-110.00 Y60.00 E17,4 F1200
;Purge line end

machine_end_gcode.default_value:
;end gcode
M104 S0 T0
M140 S0 T0
G162 Z F1800
G28 X Y
M652
M132 X Y Z A B
G91
M18
